attributes.action: Dedicate 1 hour of education per week to Political Studies
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: I propose that in the education curriculi of Scotland, England, Northern Ireland and Wales - Pupils should take a Political Studies class for 1 hour a week in order to inform them of the British and Devolved Political Systems, International Issues and Voting. I urge you the great British Public to back this petition.
